LanguageData.Eye.label: eye
LanguageData.Heart.label: heart
LanguageData.Heart.description: An installed natural heart. Supplies blood and oxygen to all parts of the body. Ready to find a new owner.
LanguageData.Stomach.label: stomach
LanguageData.Stomach.description: An installed natural stomach. Digests food and turns it into energy and nutrients.
LanguageData.Jaw.label: jaw
LanguageData.Jaw.description: An installed natural stomach. A nice set of teeth for chewing food and talking.
LanguageData.Leg.label: leg
LanguageData.Leg.description: An installed natural leg. They're long meaty sticks that let you move around.
LanguageData.Arm.label: arm
LanguageData.Arm.description: An installed natural arm. Arms are like legs, except you can carry stuff with them.
